page.title: 15A TYPICAL SATURDAY. ANDREW.
page.content: On a Saturday I usually get up at about 7.30am to take our dog for a walk.I normally take the dog down onto the beach which is nearby and we usually stay for about half an hour. When I get back my mum is up and I have my breakfast.After that I go out on my bike with some friends until about 11.00am.Then we go shopping.We go either to Chester,Birkenhead or Liverpool.We have lunch out and do more shopping in the afternoon and arrive home at 2.30pm.Then I go and watch the sport on the television until we have our tea at 4.30pm.I usually go out to play with my friends until 8,00pm come back,watch the television until 9.00pm go to bed and read for about half an hour and then go to sleep.That is a typical Saturday for our family.
